subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology
subSections.text: From {{der|ja|ltc|社|tr=dzyæX||god of earth; place for worshiping the god of earth}}

subSections.title: Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|suffix|しゃ}}

# Abbreviation of [[会社]] ([[かいしゃ]] kaisha) "company."; [[co.]]
#* [[毎日]][[新聞]][[社]]
#*: [[まいにち]][[しんぶん]]'''しゃ'''
#*: ''Mainichi Shimbun-sha''
#*: The Mainichi Newspapers [Company]
# When in parentheses, an abbreviation of [[社団]][[法人]] ([[しゃだん]][[ほうじん]] shadan hōjin), a type of [[incorporated]] [[association]].
